member.name: M:RubyRemit.Api.Controllers.PaymentsController.ProcessPayment(RubyRemit.Domain.DTOs.MainRequestBody)
member.summary: Submits a new payment request for processing with an external payment gateway, based on the details in paymentRequest.
member.param: A JSON object containing payment details.
member.remarks:
The properties of the paymentRequest parameter are described below:
creditCardNumber The credit card number for this transaction
cardHolder The customer name shown on the credit card
expirationDate The expiration date on the credit card
securityCode The 3-digit security code on the credit card, if available
amount The amount to be processed, in British pounds
member.returns: A JSON object containing a succeeded (bool), message (string) and data (object) properties.
member.response: Bad request! Invalid input detected. See details in response body.
Error! Unable to process the payment at this time. See details in response body.
